SDS content for the web not managed by college relations

https://smithcollege-sds.github.io/sds-www/

To build this website, knit `www/index.Rmd`; the website's contents will be saved
in the `docs/` folder. The contents of `www/_site.yml` determine the layout of the
webpage: menubar contents, webpage theme, etc.
